name: Doka-fli
summary: Game that takes place in the credits of the Game Gear Micro White, made for the Sega Master System/Sega Mark III by M2. It is a simple game where you destroy the credits of the staff that worked on the game and the GG Micro White/Aleste collection by bouncing a spaceship among them. Released on December 24, 2020 inside the Game Gear Micro White, and in extremely limited quantities for the Sega Master System.

videos.title: [Homebrew] "Dokafli" Aleste Collection Credits SEGA Master System
